column7: A mixed-voice chorus of students from across campus performing the music of Black Americans, ranging from the Negro spiritual, anthems, and formal music, to traditional and contemporary gospel, jazz, and rhythm and blues. Open to all students with assignments made according to proficiency. Completion of course involves, in addition to the regular schedule of rehearsals, participation in public performances by the ensemble. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate terms. Prerequisite: Audition may required and/or consent of instructor.
